==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=赱}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|夭|t1=young, running man|止|t2=foot|ls=ic}} – a running man. The top component ({{lang|zh|夭}}) simplified to the unrelated {{zh-l|土}}.

As with {{zh-l|圭}}, there are two separate vertical strokes, not a single one.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[go]]; to [[walk]]; to go [[on foot]]
#* {{zh-x|走 吧！|Let's go!}}
#* {{zh-x|他 走 在 我 的 面前。|He '''walked''' before me.}}
#* {{zh-x|不 要 走 得 那麼 快！|Don't '''walk''' so fast!}}
#* {{zh-x|走 著[着]{zhe} 去 火車站 要 多久？|How long does it take to '''walk''' to the station?}}
# to [[leave]]; to [[go away]]
#* {{zh-x|我 要 走 了。|I am going to '''go'''. / I am '''leaving'''}}
#* {{zh-x|儂 啥辰光 走？|When are you leaving?|SH}}
#* {{zh-x|佢 啱啱 走 咗。|He/she just left.|C-GZ}}
# to [[leak]]; to [[let out]]
#* {{zh-x|煤氣 管道 走 氣 了。|Gas is '''leaking''' from the pipe.}}
# {{lb|zh|of devices}} to [[run]]; to [[work]]
#* {{zh-x|我 的 手錶 不 走 了。|My watch doesn' t '''work'''.}}
# to [[visit]]; to [[call on]]
#* {{zh-x|他們 兩 家 走 得 很 近。|The two families often '''visit''' each other.}}
# to make a [[move]]
#* {{zh-x|我 的 對手 走 了 一 步 妙 棋。|My opponent '''made''' a clever '''move''' (chess).}}
#* {{zh-x|該 你 走 了。|It's your '''move'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|euphemism}} to [[die]]
# to [[change]]; to [[lose]] original [[shape]], [[flavour]], etc.
#* {{zh-x|鋼琴 走 調{diào} 了，音色 很 難聽。|The piano was out of tune; it sounded very bad.}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[leave out]] (from a dish); to [[hold]] {{attention|zh|please check}}
#: {{zh-x|走 蛋|hold the eggs|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Min|Wu|dialectal|_|Mandarin}} to [[run]]; to [[jog]]
# [[from]]; [[through]]
#* {{zh-x|我們 可以 走 這邊 進去。|We can get in '''from''' this side.}}

====See also====
* {{zh-l|跑|to run; {{qualifier|dialectal}} to leave; {{qualifier|dialectal}} to go}}
